column1: What is the importance of understanding the concept of a data type?

What are the different data types used in programming to represent the following values? (Please list the appropriate data type for each value)
- Whole numbers: _
- Decimal numbers: _
- Logical values (true/false): _
- Single characters: _
- Sequences of characters: _
- Dates and times: _
- Collection of related data fields: _
- Collection of homogeneous data elements: _
